t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: EQUAL EXCHANGE Organic Spicy Hot Cocoa, 12 OZ
s: (One brand used chipotle pepper. Ugh - NEVER AGAIN!! It gives it a really nasty aftertaste. IMHO, chipotle doesn't even belong in true Mexican food, and I grew up eating Mexican food in California.) But this brand, Equal Exchange, uses chili and cinnamon, and it is the PERFECT BALANCE.
